attributes.action: BAN GEORDIE LEE FROM HOSTING AND FROM OWNING A PC
attributes.additional_details:
We The Public Are Asking For Lee Wilson, aka GeordieLee
As Hosting L&M hosting.
We ask for him to be banned from hosting websites online for life. Also banned from owning a pc.
This person is so vile and rude.
Abuses people, and posts nasty msgs about neil devlin whom recently tragically lost his life,
This vile person posted several msgs on FaceBook and in Neils Remembrance GuestBook.
THIS MAN RIPS PEOPLE OFF AND CLOSES THEIR WEBSITE AFTER TAKING THEIR MONEY,
Also Hacks peoples websites for fun.
Please help us get him off the internet for good.
And sign our petition.
